title: `mysql_client` provider schema
description: The `mysql_client` root schema comprises the entire provider databag for this interface.

username.title: Database User Username
username.description: Username for connecting to the requested database

password.title: Database User Password
password.description: Password for connecting to the requested database

database.title: Database Name
database.description: The database name delivered by the provider. Might not be the same as requested by the requirer

endpoints.title: Database Endpoints
endpoints.description: A list of database endpoints used to connect to the database

uris.title: URIs
uris.description: A connection string in URI format used to connect to the database

read-only-endpoints.title: Read-Only Database Endpoints
read-only-endpoints.description: A list of endpoints used to connect to the database in read-only mode.

read-only-uris.title: Read only URIs
read-only-uris.description: A connection string in URI format used to connect to the read only endpoint of the database

version.title: Version
version.description: The version of the database engine

entity-name.title: Entity name
entity-name.description: Name for the requested custom entity.

entity-password.title: Entity password
entity-password.description: Password for the requested custom entity.
